Introduction

We in the Zone (Korean: 윗츠; Japanese: ウィッツ), also known as WITZ, was a Boy Group under Choon Entertainment. The group consisted of five members: Eson, Jooan, Min, Kyeongheon, and Shihyun. They made their official debut with a self-titled album on May 27th 2019.

In January 2021, Kyeongheon revealed through a now-deleted instagram post that all members have terminated with contracts with Choon Entertainment due to internal issues—Effectively disbanding the group after 3 years of promotions.
